OUR GUARANTEE ON ALL FINANCED VEHICLES SOLD:

1.	101 Multi point check by AA/DEKRA

3.	Battery check by regional battery fitment centre
4.	Roadworthy certificate
5.	1 YEAR WARRANTY AVAILABLE Finance is available.

We also offer same day sales transaction and a nationwide business service subject to terms and conditions. Bank finance available and Trade-ins are welcome. Please Call one of our professional sales executives for assistance.

Contact our Whatsapp Business Number on 072 410 7375
